mapper.select: SELECT W.W_NO, C.C_NO, C.C_TITLE, C.C_CONTENT, C.C_MAINIMG FROM CLUB C JOIN WISHLIST W ON C.C_NO = W.C_NO WHERE W.M_NO = #{param1} AND C.C_DELETE = 0

SELECT * FROM CLUBLIST CL JOIN CLUB C ON CL.C_NO = C.C_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.M_NO = C.M_NO WHERE CL.M_NO = #{param1} AND C.C_PART = #{param2} AND TO_CHAR(C.C_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.C_DELETE = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLUB C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE C.C_DELETE = 0 AND C.M_NO = #{param1} AND TO_CHAR(C.C_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE R.M_NO = #{param1} AND TO_CHAR(R.RES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN PLACEOPTION PO ON R.PO_NO IN (SELECT PO.PO_NO FROM PLACEOPTION PO JOIN PLACE P ON PO.P_NO IN (SELECT P.P_NO FROM PLACE P JOIN SELLER S ON P.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE S.S_NO = #{param1})) WHERE TO_CHAR(R.RES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT C_NO, C_TITLE, C_STARTDATE, C_ENDDATE, C_MIN, C_MAX, C_MAINIMG, C_PART FROM CLUB WHERE M_NO = #{param1} AND TO_CHAR(C_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND C_DELETE = 0
SELECT C_NO, C_TITLE, C_STARTDATE, C_ENDDATE, C_MIN, C_MAX, C_MAINIMG, C_PART FROM CLUB WHERE M_NO = #{param1} AND TO_CHAR(C_ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT RES.RES_NO, RES.RES_DATE, RES.RES_PEOPLE, RES.RES_STATE, RES.RES_PRICE, PO.PO_NAME, P.P_NAME, P.P_ADDR, P.P_ADDRDETAIL, P.P_IMG FROM RESERVATION RES JOIN PLACEOPTION PO ON RES.PO_NO = PO.PO_NO JOIN PLACE P ON P.P_NO = PO.P_NO WHERE RES.M_NO = #{param1} AND P.P_DELETE = 0
SELECT CL.CL_NO, CL.CL_CARD, M.M_NO, M.M_NAME, M.M_BIRTH, M.M_NICK, M.M_PHONE, M.M_EMAIL FROM CLUBLIST CL JOIN MEMBER M ON CL.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE CL.C_NO = #{param1}
